Detailed Description

Packets of this class are used to get informtion from the debit table in the UserModule.

The rows that will be returned might be specified by using date and UIN.

After the normal RequestPacket header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & startTime \ +4 & 4 bytes & endTime \ +8 & 4 bytes & startIndex \ +12 & 4 bytes & endIndex \ {tabular}

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ListDebitRequestPacket::ListDebitRequestPacket (  uint32  UIN,
uint32  startTime,
uint32  endTime,
uint32  startIndex = 0,
uint32  endIndex = 99
) 
 

Create a new packet with the values of the dates and the UIN set.

Parameters:
UIN The user to get debit records for.
startTime The minium time for the records to return. 0 for no limit.
endTime The maxium time for the records to return. MAX_UINT32 for no limit.
startIndex The index of the first debit record to return.
endIndex The index of the last debit record to return.
